request_body.message: can you notify the IT guy about the bug in the app that i told him to fix. send him an email at james123.ja35@gmail.com. you can decide the subject and email body

response_json.reply: Email sent to james123.ja35@gmail.com with the subject and body you requested. Let me know if you want any changes or a follow-up reminder.

body.subject: Urgent: Please fix the app bug I reported
body.body:
Hi James,

Please address the bug in the app that I previously asked you to fix. It’s causing unexpected behavior and needs prompt attention. Could you confirm you’ve received this and provide an estimated time to resolve? If you need more details or steps to reproduce, let me know and I will send them.

Thanks,
MitsoBot (on behalf of the requester)
